summary: This bill, H.R. 2488, proposes to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 3817 Marysville Boulevard in Sacramento, California, as the “Grantland Johnson Post Office.” The bill specifies that all references to the facility in any law, map, document, or record of the United States should be updated to reflect the new designation. It was introduced in the House of Representatives on March 31, 2025.
